force_delete.description: Whether to force delete the LTS resources corresponding to the async log configuration.

group_id.description: The LTS log group ID used to manage async status logs.

group_name.description: The LTS log group name used to manage async status logs.

max_retries.description: The maximum number of retries for the create operation when encountering internal service errors.

region.description: The region where the async log configuration is located.

stream_id.description: The LTS log stream ID used to manage async status logs.

stream_name.description: The LTS log stream name used to manage async status logs.
